instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00164 - fan.
threads.message:
just repaired a liquid damaged 820-00164. fan spin constantly at soon i plug magsafe2 charger.
i can see question mark folder on screen.
fan doesnt stop, start and stop and start again. is this normal on the 2015 boards?

threads.title: 820-00164 - fan.
threads.message: "fan doesnt stop, start and stop and start again" No idea what that means.

threads.title: 820-00164 - fan.
threads.message:
the macbook air 2013-2014, when you plug the magsafe, the fan will spin then stop then spin, then stop then spin...

does it do this on the macbook air 2015 or fan just constantly spinning?

threads.title: 820-00164 - fan.
threads.message: 2015 will not do the 3 times on/off before boot.
